mapper.sql: select PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, PRICE, category, DETAIL, IMAGE_ADDRESS, IMAGE_EXT from product_TB
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT_TB(PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, PRICE, category, DETAIL, IMAGE_ADDRESS, IMAGE_EXT) VALUES(PRODUCT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{PRODUCT_NAME}, #{PRICE}, #{category}, #{DETAIL}, #{IMAGE_ADDRESS}, #{IMAGE_EXT})
mapper.update: UPDATE product_tb SET PRODUCT_NAME = #{PRODUCT_NAME}, PRICE = #{PRICE}, category = #{category}, DETAIL=#{DETAIL}, IMAGE_ADDRESS = #{IMAGE_ADDRESS}, IMAGE_EXT= #{IMAGE_EXT} where product_id = #{product_id}
